title: Let's Talk About Troy Baker and NFTs - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.14.22
description:
Blessing and Tam close out the week with a discussion about VoiceverseNFTs, Respawn, and PlayStation Now quietly going away?

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:15 - Housekeeping

It’s a big Friday:

Peacemaker episodes 1-3 reactions are being recorded today and going up ASAP on Youtube.com/kindafunny as a Kinda Funny Screencast.

Everybody is playing Everybody’s Golf on Twitch right after this to decide the rivalry of Andy vs Greg.

Then of course Xcast records later today on Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames and goes live for everyone tomorrow on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report -

00:10:00 - Troy Baker Is Working With NFTs, but Fans Are Unimpressed
00:30:10 - Sony pulling PlayStation Now cards from retail stores
00:38:33 - Ads
00:41:50 - Respawn isn’t canceling secretive third game after losing director
00:50:56 - A PS5 version of Apex Legends has been spotted on PSN
00:52:32 - Out today
00:53:50 - NVIDIA GeForce Update
 Reader mail -
00:54:45 - “Sony's Spartacus update to PlayStation Plus should include streaming access to the movies they produce…” - luciddre4m
01:00:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Mon: Blessing and Tim
Tues: Greg and Gary Whitta
Wed: Blessing and Andy
Thurs: Greg and Tim
Fri: Blessing and Tam

  • It’s a big Friday:

  • Then of course Xcast records later today on Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames and goes live for everyone tomorrow on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
